# Ejes
```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(reticulate)
library(gcookbook)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r, out.width="50%", out.height="50%", fig.align='center'}
ggplot(PlantGrowth, aes(x = group, y = weight)) +
  geom_boxplot()

ggplot(PlantGrowth, aes(x = group, y = weight)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  coord_flip()
```
